DocAttribute.Name: Axis1
DocAttribute.Documentation: The direction used to determine U[1], the derived X axis direction.

DocAttribute.Name: Axis2
DocAttribute.Documentation: The direction used to determine U[2], the derived Y axis direction.

DocAttribute.Name: LocalOrigin
DocAttribute.Documentation: The required translation, specified as a cartesian point. The actual translation included in the transformation is from the geometric origin to the local origin.

DocAttribute.Name: Scale
DocAttribute.Documentation: The scaling value specified for the transformation.

DocAttribute.Name: Scl
DocAttribute.Documentation: The derived scale S of the transformation, equal to scale if that exists, or 1.0 otherwise.

DocAttribute.Name: Dim
DocAttribute.Documentation: The space dimensionality of this class, determined by the space dimensionality of the local origin.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The derived scaling Scl shall be greater than zero.
